## {{< fa solid database >}} Revisting wheat seed morphological traits

::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="40%"}


- 190 seeds selected at random from a line of diploid wheat, _Triticum monococcum_ for several morphological traits:
  - weight (mg),
  - length (mm),
  - diameter (mm),
  - moisture content (%), and
  - endosperm hardness (single-kernel characterization system index value).



:::

## Exploring multivariate or multivariable data

::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="60%"}

```{webr}
#| autorun: true
GGally::ggpairs(wheatseed)
```


:::

::: {.column width="40%"}

- **Multivariate data**: multiple _dependent_ variables. 
- **Multivariable data**: multiple _independent_ variables.

- What is independent and dependent variable can be context specific!
